Attribute.Name: CalculatedTradeItemLength
Attribute.ValueTemplate:
<derive expr="{
    value1:=IF(PRODUNIT('TradeItemDepth')="ft",value('TradeItemDepth', 'unece.unit.MTR'),
        IF(PRODUNIT('TradeItemDepth')="in",value('TradeItemDepth', 'unece.unit.CMT'),
            IF(PRODUNIT('TradeItemDepth')="m",value('TradeItemDepth', 'unece.unit.FOT'),
                IF(PRODUNIT('TradeItemDepth')="cm",value('TradeItemDepth', 'unece.unit.INH'),
                    ""
                )
            )
        )
    ),
    value2:=if(round(value1, 2)="0","0",round(value1, 2))
}concatenate(
    value2,
     IF(
        PRODUNIT('TradeItemDepth')="ft",
        " m",
        ""
    ),
    IF(
        PRODUNIT('TradeItemDepth')="m",
        " ft",
        ""
    ),
    IF(
        PRODUNIT('TradeItemDepth')="in",
        " cm",
        ""
    ),
    IF(
        PRODUNIT('TradeItemDepth')="cm",
        " in",
        ""
    )
)"/>

MetaData.Value: It is used to store the converted Length Value.
